title: AnalyzeTrace
description: A program to analyze SUMA (and AFNI's perhaps) stack output for functions that return with RETURN without bothering to go on the stack.

tracefile.title: Trace output file
tracefile.description: Trace output file obtained by redirecting the program’s trace output.

max_func_lines.title: Maximum function lines
max_func_lines.description: Set the maximum number of code lines before a function returns. Default is no limit.

suma_c.title: SUMA C file
suma_c.description: FILE is a SUMA_*.c file. It is analyzed for functions that use SUMA_RETURN without ENTRY.

max_err.title: Maximum errors
max_err.description: Stop after encountering MAX_ERR errors reported in log. Default is 5. Error key terms are: 'Error', 'error', 'corruption'.

novolreg.title: Ignore volume registration
novolreg.description: Ignore any Rotate, Volreg, Tagalign, or WarpDrive transformations present in the Surface Volume.

setenv.title: Set environment variable
setenv.description: Set environment variable ENVname to be ENVvalue. Quotes are necessary.

trace.title: Trace flag
trace.description: Turns on In/Out debug and Memory tracing.
